## Making plots for Experiment 2
### load data
```{r}
EXP2<-read.csv(file="/Users/oliviacattau/Documents/GitHub/fish541_lab/data/EXP 2/exp2_run1_PCR_results.csv")
names(EXP2)[8]<-'Cq'
```
## Make Plot with ggpplot2
### do GLM analysis for p-values
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggsignif)
library(rstatix)
p1<-ggplot(data=EXP2)+geom_boxplot(aes(x=Treatment, y=Cq))+theme_bw()
g1<-glm(EXP2$Cq~EXP2$Treatment)
summary(g1)
```
